column4: guys I ve installed AWN on Hardy , but its without applets , each time I install the Applets package , it removes the AWN and vice versa , any help
where have you got the awn widgets packet you're using from?
: http://wiki.awn-project.org/index.php?title=Awn_Extras:Installation#Ubuntu
so are you using the awn testing team package or the reacocard one?
I really have no idea
I think the testing , thats what I added to sources.list
ok, https://launchpad.net/~awn-testing/+archive go there and add that repository, and install the awn packages from there instead of the ones in universe
thats exactly what I added to my sources.list
ok, in that case the packages you need to have installed are orgonurg yes, go to System > Preferences > Sound and set the Default Mixer Track to be the PCM for the correct card
install avant-window-navigator-trunk awn-extra-applets-trunk awn-manager-trunk
did you get my replies?
: I just installed the extras again and it removed my AWN
install the awn trunk package
I did
avant-window-navigator-trunk
are you installing awn-extras-applets-trunk or a different extras package?
just awn extra applets trunk
I don't know what else to suggest, I've got avant-window-navigator-trunk awn-extras-applets-trunk and awn-manager-trunk installed fine...
it might remove some libawn packages to install those, that's fine
: thanx it worked =)
cool :)
I was trying to get the awn manager without trunk , but now I've installed the trunk one and it worked
: thanx alot buddy
